      If true, all HTML symbols are replaced with appropriate entities.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.expandProperties(Boolean expandProperties)
      If true, TestServer expands property expansion expressions in retrieved values.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.failOnEmpty(Boolean failOnEmpty)
      If true, the test step fails if the data source is empty.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.name(String name)
      Test step name.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.preload(Boolean preload)
      If true, the TestServer tries to preload the data before running the test.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.restartShared(Boolean restartShared)
      If true and shared is also true, resets the iterator when it reaches the end of data source.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.shared(Boolean shared)
      If true, the data source iterator is used by all concurrent virtual users.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.skipLoopOnEmpty(Boolean skipLoopOnEmpty)
      If true, skips the data source loop if the data source is empty.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.startRow(String startRow)
      Zero-based index of the initial row that the data source uses.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.testSteps(List<TestStep> testSteps)
      Array of test steps using the data source and forming a data source loop.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.trimValues(Boolean trimValues)
      If true, all leading and trailing spaces are removed.
      DataSourceTestStep DataSourceTestStep.type(String type)
      Test step type.
